casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 9, 2006. C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of February 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time For Court Reporter to Deliver Transcripts:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 10th day of April 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of February 2006."
